title: Bitch Like Me (Intro)
lyrics: You ain't never met a bitch like me
Get you lit like me, politic like me
Put that shit on, pop and flex a fit like me
You ain't never met a bitch like me
Get you lit like me, politic like me
Put that shit on, pop and flex a fit like me, like me
And I don't need no assistance to confront you hoes
You still runnin' for position, I'm already gold, ayy
Up on the podium that God chose, ayy
Too much sodium, you salty though, woday
Can't let these niggas claim me, that's a big no-no
Too fugazi in this bitch, so I move slow mo'
Too many wins to count, I can't keep total
Worry 'bout me, you should worry 'bout your kids
Fuck with me, thеn you fucked up big
Hey, baby, I'm 'bout them hеrs and his
Drink up, you ain't gotta be so stiff
